content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”The Stitt Feld Handy Group provides professional development and leadership training in negotiation, dispute resolution and dealing with difficult people.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:28px|text_align:left|line_height:36px” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1533051457529{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]The Stitt Feld Handy Group offers specialized training on topics such as Negotiation, Mediation, Having Difficult Conversations and others. The Stitt Feld Handy Group also provides workplace restoration services and coaching.

The Stitt Feld Handy Group’s workshops and online courses are recognized by the ADR Institute of Ontario and are conducted in affiliation with the University of Windsor. Graduates of select courses receive a University of Windsor Law School Certificate upon completion.

Please visit the  Stitt Feld Handy Group website for more information.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”hidden-print”][vc_custom_heading text=”Company” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”menu-header”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”54″][/vc_column][/vc_row]

The Stitt Feld Handy Group also provides workplace restoration services and coaching. […]
